opinion:
QUINT v. LANTZ, 100 Conn. App. 901 (2007) 917 A.2d 1064 RICHARD R. QUINT v. THERESA LANTZ ET AL. No. (AC 25992).Appellate Court of Connecticut
Gruendel, Lavine and Foti, Js.
Argued February 21 2007.
Officially released March 27, 2007.
Plaintiffs appeal from the Superior Court in the judicial district of New Haven, Jones, J.
Per Curiam.
The judgment is affirmed.
